text: Anndee, ko Allah woodani diina laaɓuka kan. Ɓen non ɓe ɓeya jogitori yiɗɓe gaanin Makko (hara hiɓe wi'a): "Men alaa rewirde ɗi, si wanaa tun no ɗi ɓannira men ka Allah, ɓadal". Pellet, Allah ñaawoyay hakkunde maɓɓe, e kon ko ɓe woni lurrude e mun. Pellet, Allah fewnataa on wonɗo fewnoowo, ɗuuɗuɗo yeddugol
